title: Cure - 1981 12 03 - Hammersmith Palais, London, England.flac
description:
Cure - 03 Dec 81 - Hammersmith Palais, London, England


Mainset:

the drowning man
in your house
splintered in her head
the funeral party
primary
the figurehead
charlotte sometimes
other voices
at night
the hanging garden
m
play for today
a forest
forever 	

Encore 1:

one hundred years
faith
